params.name: batch_or_word_index
params.description: Index of the sequence in the batch. If the batch only comprise one sequence, this can be the index ofthe word in the sequence

params.name: word_index
params.description: If a batch index is provided in batch_or_token_index, this can be the index of the word in thesequence.

params.name: sequence_index
params.description: If pair of sequences are encoded in the batch this can be used to specify which sequence in the pair (0or 1) the provided word index belongs to.
